description.oldValue:
Today, the site sharing e-mails come from no-reply@sharepointonline.com. To improve delivery success, we will start sending these mails from the user's exchange mailbox, as we do for other sharing e-mails.
GA date: September CY2022
description.newValue: Today, the site sharing e-mails come from no-reply@sharepointonline.com. To improve delivery success, we will start sending these mails from the user's exchange mailbox, as we do for other sharing e-mails.
